website_summaries.verdict: A modern favorite of many, this costume is detailed down to the fabric fringe and fits a variety of sizes.
pros: Parents appreciate that the costume covers more skin than the outfit did on the actual character
With several pieces to the costume, it easily inspire's a little girl's imagination
We love the bright colors and easy fit for girls of all sizes
cons: Can run a little big, but should hold up over time if it needs to be grown into

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Moana Dress!
customer_reviews.text: Great product, but runs a little big. Very beautiful custom and great quality!!
customer_reviews.author: Ginny R

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: Daughter loves it, and so do I! Great quality easy to clean! I like this one better then the other moana costume they sell on this website!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great great outfit
customer_reviews.text: Great great outfit. It's a bit big for my three year old but I just pinned it in back and she couldn't be happier.
customer_reviews.author: morgan

customer_reviews.title: My 5yr old loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Fits a little big, but she doesn't seem to care. I'm going to adjust it a little since I sew. It's really cute though. Her little brother has a Maui outfit and they love wearing them while watching the movie.
customer_reviews.author: Jordana McDowell

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loved it, it was a great buy, she is 6 and fit her great
customer_reviews.author: JR

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: This costume is pretty cheaply made. My daughter has had it for one day and I will need to re-surge the top as all the thread is coming out. I gave it the three stars because she still loves it but if you have the opportunity to buy one that will hold up to more than 6 hours of play I recommend investing in that one instead.
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Sizing is WAY OFF
customer_reviews.text: Sizing was WAY OFF! My youngest daughter wears a 4 and my oldest wears a 7-8, the small says it fits sizes 4-6x and yet it was MUCH too large for both of them. It was falling off of the waist of my oldest, she was holding it up with one hand!!! The top stuck out on both sizes. We either got one that was tagged wrong or they need to seriously rethink their sizing!
customer_reviews.author: R. B.

customer_reviews.title: cute costume
customer_reviews.text: I agree with other reviews that it runs slightly large.We bought the size 4-6. My daughter wore it to her 7th bday party, she's 43lbs and on the shorter side for her age, she wears a 6/6x. It fit perfectly and was slightly loose on the waist. It is not high quality material but it withstood a very active birthday party with no damage and was well worth the $25 I spent. Picture shows different straps (daughter accidentally cut the plastic straps)
customer_reviews.author: tortirocks

customer_reviews.title: My daughter loved this!
customer_reviews.text: This outfit made my daughter so happy! My daughter is 3 so the skirt was to big, but we tied it up to make it work. I gave it 5 stars just because it is still in perfect condition after numerous play dates with a toddler!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: NOT A DISNEY PRODUCT AND WAY TOO SMALL FOR A 5 YEAR OLD WHO WEARS A SIZE 5
customer_reviews.text: Not at all what photo shows. I do not know how anyone gave this a 5 Star. First it does not come packaged as shown this is NOT. Licensed Disney Moana outfit. The top is super short and folds over. My daughter is 5 and 40 pounds and wears a size 5. The skirt I could hardly get on her and the top is so tiny she’s basically wearing a bikini top. The clear straps are horrible. I had to tighten them to the lowest and in trying to do so they got all reveled up. My daughter loves it so at least that was a plus.
customer_reviews.author: Alfredo

customer_reviews.text: I may have just gotten unlucky and got one of the faulty items.Sizing was too big and the belt was not put on there correctly . Even if the costume itself wasnt too big on my kid , the belt still dangles and would need to be cut and sewn .It is still a pretty costume , just got unlucky with my purchase I guess. It is not adjustable . The top has a velcro to strap the top , but cant use it to adjust to be fitted or looser.Bottom is stretchy at the back , so if you had a bigger kids , it would probably adjust to them , but can't adjust to be smaller .
customer_reviews.author: Joan

customer_reviews.title: Cute budget Moana costume
customer_reviews.text: Cute and affordable Moana costume. The skirt only has elastic on the back, so for my petite 5.5 year old, we had to safety pin a decent chunk for it to fit her. I appreciate that it's a two-piece like the character's outfit, but it's slightly re-designed to cover more skin than in the movie which 1) makes sense for the weather around Halloween and 2) makes sense for small children. ne bummer is that one of the plastic straps broke off literally immediately while we were taking it off the cardboard. I was able to sew it back on easily, but it wouldn't been nice for it to just be sturdier in the first place.
customer_reviews.author: Leanna

customer_reviews.title: My daughter is 4 years old. 38 pounds and ...
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is 4 years old. 38 pounds and it was really big in her. Had to take it Somewhere to fix it. But it looks cute
customer_reviews.author: Annethy  Liriano

customer_reviews.title: The joy that they both expressed upon opening couldn't have gone ...
customer_reviews.text: I got two, for some 6-year-old adorables in my life. The joy that they both expressed upon opening couldn't have gone better. They immediately stopped their Christmases to go change & become Moana for the rest of the day. I'm told the niece has actually worn it for 4 of the past 6 days, with her "Moana necklace" that she already had. And when the granddaughter opened hers, before even removing it from the packaging, stated: "now I need to get a Moana necklace". So just a tip...DEFINITELY order this costume, but don't forget to also get "Moana's Magical Seashell Necklace" as well.
customer_reviews.author: Rabbit

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: This was the worst of the three we bought it is so thing it almost feels like paper. It is also see through and the skirt was beyond wrinkled and folded awkwardly when we received it. If we had time I’d return it but we were only home for two days so we did Christmas early my niece liked it but it will not last long with it’s poor quality
customer_reviews.author: Miga Cooper

customer_reviews.title: I am very disappointed of this product
customer_reviews.text: I am very disappointed of this product. My daughter was so excited to receive Moana’s costume, and her happiness immediately ended, after the plastic strips broke only 5 minutes after wearing it!!!!!!! Also, the material is very cheap....a poorly made costume. I would have given it 0 stars, if I could....
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bottom needs tighter waste/Ability to adjust smaller
customer_reviews.text: Size is WAY too big for what it shows. My daughter is in a 5T right now and this thing is still swimming on her and the bottoms fall off. We use a binder clip on the back to hold them up, but after a year or more of this thing we are surprised it is still too big. I would say it fits more like a 6/7 in young girls.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly H.

customer_reviews.title: Loosk good, but no way to adjust the fit
customer_reviews.text: This is a skirt and top that look very much like the movie. The top has a simple Velcro closure behind the neck. The skirt just slips on, but the ribbon that constitutes a belt is sewn in place. So neither the top nor skirt have any way to adjust the fit. The 5 year old loved it as a Christmas gift, but hasn't worn it much because she's slender and we have to get creative to make it the skirt stay on.
customer_reviews.author: DLW

customer_reviews.title: Fits skinny kids too!
customer_reviews.text: Vey gray for the price! My daughter is about 50 lbs and 4' if you need a reference for size... we got the 6x please see image to see how it fit on her... the costume is super well made for the price... we will be using it for play all year long after Halloween! Beware the it does expose the midriff just a little bit
customer_reviews.author: jean vong

customer_reviews.title: So perfect!!
customer_reviews.text: I found out on Friday that my kids daycare was having spirit week and Monday was Moana day. I jumped on and ordered this costume. She looked so cute and her costume was a hit!!! It’s now in her dress up chest so she can be Moana whenever she wants lol
customer_reviews.author: Sandra

customer_reviews.title: Not as pictured
customer_reviews.text: Does not look at all like the picture. Very cheaply made. Only reason I haven't returned right away is I need to see if I can get a different one before my daughter's party. Both her and I are very disappointed with this
customer_reviews.author: Shantel

customer_reviews.title: Too big for toddlers but ok with sewing it.
customer_reviews.text: My 3 years and 3 months old daughter loves this costume but it's way too big for a 3 years old. I bought it because it says 3+ and my daughter is a tall 3 years old. Got shocked that it was so big on her and the skirt couldn't even stay on her hips. So i had to sew it in to make it look fitted. It was still too long for her but so much better. I didn't get upset because the price was good. I didn't mind to put some extra work on it.
customer_reviews.author: Jiwon

customer_reviews.title: Received the Disney outfit
customer_reviews.text: My 7 year old loved it! We ordered it to use as a Halloween costume since the in store ones were $30 and not very cute. She is a little small for her age, but not too much. The skirt seems a bit loose on her, but could easily be fixed with a pin. It works for us since it will likely be chilly on Halloween and I could fit a pair of nude leggings underneath with no problem.
customer_reviews.author: pen name

customer_reviews.title: Save your money and find another costume
customer_reviews.text: This costume is definitely not Disney quality. I was very disappointed in this costume. It has clear plastic straps that were stretched out after one use, the material is very flimsy. It does not fit either of my daughters correctly and has basically been banned to the back of the closet. My daughters love to dress up and we have EVERY Disney princess dress....this definitely was disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: tampacollector2

customer_reviews.title: I would purchase again
customer_reviews.text: This dress arrived very quick! It was packaged neatly and seems to be the perfect size. I say seems to be a perfect size because, I purchased it for a Christmas gift for my niece so she hasn’t tried it on yet. I did hold it up next to my daughter who is a size 6/7 and it looks like it will be the perfect size. Overall I am very pleased with this gift thus far!
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Snodgrass

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't be better!
customer_reviews.text: I loved it. I was a little worried when I got it because of the material but when my kid tried it on, not only was I elated but so was she! She really looked like Moana. My kid just turned 4 and I think it does run a little big but I used some safety pins and was able to work it so she looked great for her pictures. Really great colors!
customer_reviews.author: elena gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for the price AND super cute!
customer_reviews.text: Worried after seeing the handful of “knock off” reviews, I’m sending this out to my husbands 5yr old niece who lives in Central America so i can’t say if it’ll fit or not but as far as quality it’s perfect for the price (I would have paid more lol) Love the color as well, I know she’s going to love it! The necklace was separate btw.
customer_reviews.author: COCO

customer_reviews.title: Skirt is too big and not adjustable
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is a 4T and like many have said, this costume is quite big. Because it is two pieces, the skirt doesn’t stay on my daughter’s hips at all. So frustrating as she was so excited to get this. I will see if I can pin it or somehow sew the skirt to the top, but I wish there was a way to tighten the skirt since it’s supposed to fit a 4-6. If your child is a smaller 4T, this will be too big.
customer_reviews.author: Shoe Gal

customer_reviews.title: Not bad for $9
customer_reviews.text: This costume is about what you’d expect for $9. It’s cute but not going to last for a long time. My daughter had “Disney day” at her summer camp and wanted to be Moana. The top didn’t fit my daughter very well so we put a red tank top under it and it looked fine and made the costume a bit more modest.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Make sure you pick the right size
customer_reviews.text: The skirt is perfect for my 7yr old the shirt was too small it shows most of her stomach which i dont care for and the straps are plastic so one broke when i tried to take it out the box 🤦🏾 but she likes it shw loves costumes and she wears it often
customer_reviews.author: Ashley C.

customer_reviews.title: I knew when I bought this I wouldn't be getting the best quality but I thought for sure with all these ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for Halloween. One of the straps already broke with my daughter just trying the costume on. Also, one of the straps is stitched to the outside of the costume, so the ends of the clear straps are showing. That same strap is also attached with one stitch. Geez, I knew when I bought this I wouldn't be getting the best quality but I thought for sure with all these great reviews it would at least not be a project for me to fix someone else's shoddy work.
customer_reviews.author: lauren haberman

customer_reviews.title: BEWARE!!
customer_reviews.text: Size range is too great. Its way too big for a 4 year old (size 4-6X). Also BEWARE if you are buying for a Halloween costume. Seller only gives 30 days to return it. They won't accept my return (I bought for my granddaughter last month) saying window expired a few days ago (even though Halloween is 1 1/2 months away).
customer_reviews.author: Oze

customer_reviews.title: sizing
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my granddaughter who is almost 3. The size says 2-3 so I purchased it and when I get it in the mail it's sizes 4-6x..... I don't know how I missed that. Needless to say she cannot wear it. It was cute and would have been perfect but I cant use it for another 6 years so it is no good to me now.
customer_reviews.author: tabetha stevens

customer_reviews.title: Picture is accurate
customer_reviews.text: My niece loved it but I wished it came with the necklace as well wouldnt mind paying extra therefore the outfit would be a complete look. The material is alittle Halloween cheap costume feel but she was happy so I didnt care
customer_reviews.author: Carlotta

customer_reviews.title: Too big...
customer_reviews.text: 4-6 is such a huge age range. I'm not sure how you get something that fit a 6 year old to also for a 4 year old. My 4.5 year old is tall for her age and thin. I had to sew the skirt and the straps to get to fit. But the length is good
customer_reviews.author: Eshe

customer_reviews.title: Not true to size
customer_reviews.text: First of All, it ranges from 4T to 6X that is a broad size so, if your child (toddler) uses a size 4T it is way to big and it has only 1/2 part elastic waist. No drawstrings to resize. So sorry, material was okay, not the best. But, you get what you pay for. sorry I will pass on this one. :(
customer_reviews.author: Azteca

customer_reviews.title: FYI this is a two piece outfit
customer_reviews.text: FYI the top and the skirt are separate (yes it clearly states this in the description...but I didn't read it....ha ha) - good for fitting a variety of sized children but different than I expected from the photo. Skirt portion is a little thicker than I expected and should hold up pretty well!
customer_reviews.author: my2cents

customer_reviews.title: But it fits great now. Used it for a Birthday costume for ...
customer_reviews.text: Very cute Moana costume. This one has loose a "grass" skirt under the outer wrap. Rather large in size though. Bought the size 4-6 for my slender 7yo. Still had to take in the top and skirt by several inches. But it fits great now. Used it for a Birthday costume for her Moana theme, will use it again for Halloween.
customer_reviews.author: Dunn Girls

customer_reviews.title: adorable. fits great
customer_reviews.text: adorable. fits great. my daughter is about to turn seven and i would say average in her height and weight but she is taller than most her class. 50 inches tall and wears a size 7 in clothes. so that is probably the accurate size of this outfit. however the material decent. it is very cute overall a good buy. but fyi if your child is as picky as mine she will probably tell you the skirt makes her legs itchy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy, daughter loves it!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product for my 4 year old (almost 5) daughter. She LOVES it. She wore it to Disney on Ice and Halloween this year! Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Elisa

customer_reviews.title: This is a great costume! Since the price was so low I ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great costume! Since the price was so low I wasn't sure what to expect but it is legit and my daughter loves it! She just turned 4 and it is a little big on her but luckily there are straps and I just had to pin the waist on the skirt so it doesn't fall down. Very well made and she loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Mackenzie

customer_reviews.title: It was okay
customer_reviews.text: It was a cute outfit for halloween however it didnt cover up where I think it needed to. Showed tummy and half back. Not much to it for trick or treating you will get cold. Grand daughter loved it but she had to wear leggings and a sweater because it was to cold.
customer_reviews.author: Cecilia W

customer_reviews.title: Loves it
customer_reviews.text: My 5 year old LOVES it. It does fit her big... it's hard to have a 2+ size range on something for such small kids, but she will certainly be able to use it for a long time as it fits her better over time.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Head

customer_reviews.title: It a fun morning! He just turned 6 but is very ...
customer_reviews.text: Spent the morning doing this with my 6 year old nephew. It a fun morning! He just turned 6 but is very bright for his age. Some of the activities were a little young for his level (mixing colors,) and some concepts were a little over his head (acid vs base.) Still, I think it's great to expose kids to science early and this is a fun way to do it in an organized way. The only down side was that we made an absolute mess, but I think that's part for the course :) Will be looking into buying some of their other kits for the future.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awkward sizing but fun for playtime
customer_reviews.text: This is great for playing around the house, but the size is off. My 5 year old is usually a 6/6x on top and a 5T on the bottom. This outfit is way too small on top and way too big around the waist for her. But it's fine to wear over clothes. It's gotten a lot of use here and has held up very well. FYI the tag says hand wash only.
customer_reviews.author: Annie

customer_reviews.title: I hate buying costumes but kid is happy
customer_reviews.text: I used to make all my kids costumes... but they all wanted something hard this year and I thought it was going to be better material than just plain fabric, but my daughter is happy and that's what matters.
customer_reviews.author: mome1226

customer_reviews.title: Daugher loved it!
customer_reviews.text: I love the clear straps to help keep the top where it should. The skirt fit very well but the top was slightly gapping in the back. The straps make it pretty much a non-issue bit I will probably add another piece of velcro to make it fit a bit more securely. My daughter is 6 and is tall and thin.
customer_reviews.author: Cassie O

customer_reviews.title: This costume is adorable but definitely runs very large
customer_reviews.text: This costume is adorable but definitely runs very large. I got this for my daughter's 5th birthday but it was far too big and had to use safety pins. She is thin but tall! Even at a size 6/XS it is still very loose, but she loves the look so we make it work.
customer_reviews.author: Kate B.

customer_reviews.title: A bit large
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is 4 but this is baggy on her. She will probably have to wait another year for it to fit properly. There should be a separate size, as one size does not fit all for 4-6.
customer_reviews.author: Sean Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great alternative to full priced official costume
customer_reviews.text: Great little costume but way too big for my almost 5 year old. I am altering it so it will fit and possibly changing the straps. Im not a fan of the clear plastic ones it has. The costume has thinner fabric than the actual Disney costume -but thats good for us because we plan on using this for mostly warm summwr days.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Prime Addict

customer_reviews.title: My 3 year old loves it!
customer_reviews.text: My 3 year old loves it, it is cute and looks like the movie. Little big for 3 year old but i used i pin. The fabric is not great but ok for the price
customer_reviews.author: sura

customer_reviews.title: Fun costume, sizing is a little big
customer_reviews.text: It's a detailed costume and was a great price. We were hoping it would fit our three year old but it's too big. I think it's 4-6. There is some plastic on the top piece that is uncomfortable without anything underneath.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie

customer_reviews.title: First the size range is to broad. My daughter ...
customer_reviews.text: First the size range is to broad. My daughter is 4yrs (petite) and the costume (skirt slipped right off). Major tailoring is going be needed. For the price, I expected a more thought out costume. For the price range and broad range of size you are looking to fit you may want to look at making it more adjustable costume. I also had to pay additional postage to get it out of the post office because the postage was incorrectly labeled. I gave it a 3 because my daughter loves it and is looking forward to being Moana for a party.
customer_reviews.author: Leticia M.

customer_reviews.title: Runs large
customer_reviews.text: I love the costume, but it is so large for the sizes stated. I kept it, but have to sew it to fit. I would suggest the size for a girl 6x-7.
customer_reviews.author: SMC

customer_reviews.title: She is very happy with it
customer_reviews.text: Our 6 year old wanted this for Xmas. She is very happy with it. Quality is good. I gave it 4 stars because there isn't a size adjustment on the waist part of the skirt. It is too big on my daughter so we'll need to adjust it ourselves. A little disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: It’s flimsy and dull. This one runs very small— I read that ...
customer_reviews.text: This costume is cute, but not very well made. It’s flimsy and dull. This one runs very small— I read that it fits a size six, but my granddaughter is a size four and can barely squeeze into it. I’m extremely disappointed with this product.
customer_reviews.author: cbp in georgia

customer_reviews.title: Runs big
customer_reviews.text: This item fits way bigger than expected. My child is 5, tall (4ft), but skinny (46lbs) and she was swimming in this
customer_reviews.author: Stefanie Kappeler

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as described! Perfect.
customer_reviews.text: Having bought my other daughter the exact same outfit from Walmart, this is well worth its price. Im bummed I didnt see it before spending as much as I did on the first purchase. Its an amazing price and the same quality as Walmart and target.
customer_reviews.author: Lex

customer_reviews.title: Moana Outfit Was A Big Hit!
customer_reviews.text: My great-great niece loves Moana and I bought her the outfit as a birthday gift for her 6th birthday! She loves it and it fit great! I have another great-great turning 3 and she also loves Moana! Can you say re-order??? :)
customer_reviews.author: Charlotte Mwagbe

customer_reviews.title: Only received a skirt
customer_reviews.text: Clearly this was purchased elsewhere because they had the plastic that tags were attached to and never got the top. Only some cheap material skirt. What a waste of money, that I want back!
customer_reviews.author: Lady Smith

customer_reviews.title: Material has been holding up pretty good. Very happy with it
customer_reviews.text: It was a little too big for my 3 year old who is wearing size 5T, but did the trick with a little bit of adjustments (needle and thread :) Has withstood a couple of washes without any problems. Material has been holding up pretty good. Very happy with it!
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Not even close to what was advertised. Cheap knockoff of the Disney product.
customer_reviews.text: This is not the Disney product, but a cheap knock-off made by some company called "Vogue Fashion." It's paper-thin polyester and the "fringe" is just screen printed on. False advertising.
customer_reviews.author: sbs

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous
customer_reviews.text: We went to Disney people we’re paying $1 million for a similar outfit I think I paid eight dollars for this my daughters been wearing it every day quality is fabulous color is fabulous
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Zirbser

customer_reviews.title: Pretty costume, but trying to fit too many sizes ...
customer_reviews.text: Pretty costume, but trying to fit too many sizes into one. I've had to take tucks in the skirt and will have to sew straps on the top in order to hold it up on my granddaughter's shoulders. She, however, is very pleased with it. Problems are small things. Few costumes are going to fit like clothes one wears every day.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Runs large!
customer_reviews.text: Runs large, for sure! My daughter wears a size 5, and I had to pin up this costume for it to stay on her. She was disappointed about the clear shoulder straps, but I'm not sure how that could be changed while keeping the costume appropriate for kids.
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING!
customer_reviews.text: They say you get what you pay for... but NOT in this case! I really feel like i should have paid more (not that i want to...haha!). The quality is great and the costume fits like a glove! My daughter in almost 7 and wears a size 6/6X.
customer_reviews.author: Autumn Ivey

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy material not Disney brand as shown
customer_reviews.text: Material isn’t the best, just opened item and thread was already coming off. Not what I expected, picture on description showing it’s “Disney” brand is not what I received. I started a return but will end up keeping this item because I will not get my full refund, so It’s not worth me returning this item. My daughters are ages 3yrs and 6yrs and item did not fit. Only reason I gave them a 3 star is for the fast shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Gissel Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: It was so cute and reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: I brought it for my niece to wear for her birthday party and she loved it. Only thing the skirt was a lil bit but nothing a safety pin can't handle.
customer_reviews.author: Mzladyd

customer_reviews.title: The top fits perfectly and we love that it has straps to wear with it
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves her Moana outfit. The top fits perfectly and we love that it has straps to wear with it. The description online says it will fit a girl size 4-6. My daughter has a tiny waist so I thought this would fit good. The bottom is so big on her. She normally wears size 5 in regular clothing. I will have to clip it up so it will stay on her. Love the costume though. Quality and colors are great. I would recommend to others.
customer_reviews.author: Tina Holden

customer_reviews.title: Super disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I'm extremely disappointed. The material is ridiculously thin and made of some of the cheapest stuff imaginable. It looks nothing like the photo displayed on Amazon. It says it fits a 3T on up and I highly doubt that. I could barely get it on her. I do not recommend this product at all.
customer_reviews.author: Lewisfamily

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is a good outfit for the price. My girls enjoy wearing it. It fits my 6 year old who wears size 6x/7. For my other daughter who is 3 and wears 4T (she's tall and lean), I just used safety pins to make it fit.
customer_reviews.author: Ljns

customer_reviews.title: Moana birthday party
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter’s Moana birthday party theme and it fits well . Good for the price and not super quality dress but I’m happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: she just turned 4 and although she’s pretty big for her age
customer_reviews.text: Can’t conolain for the price but it’s a bit cheap and our daughter ended up enjoying and wearing the Moana necklace more than the outfit. Also, she just turned 4 and although she’s pretty big for her age, this outfit is still a bit large. Probably better for 5+ but it works.
customer_reviews.author: Todd Family

customer_reviews.title: My daughter is loving it. Just be careful with ...
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is loving it. Just be careful with sizing. They run big. My daughter is 5 years old and I bought 4-6. There are too much room on the top. The bottom is okay. It won't come off. I think I need to stitch it up or something until she grow into the top.
customer_reviews.author: JK

customer_reviews.title: Fit best for five to seven year olds
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my three-and-a-half-year-old and she absolutely loved it, but it was pretty big on her. She is 35 lbs and 39". I think it would fit a 6-year old or older better. We were able to safety pin it and make it work though. It seems to be pretty good quality considering the price.
customer_reviews.author: T. Hicks

customer_reviews.title: Great shipping and great price
customer_reviews.text: Really impressed with the costume! Check out the pictures... excited for Halloween! Fit perfectly and my daughter wanted to be Moana. Great shipping and great price..
customer_reviews.author: Charles Hatfield

customer_reviews.title: Fit well and decent quality
customer_reviews.text: This costume has lasted many many play sessions, with my daughter and most of her friends wearing it at one time or another. The seams and fabric are still intact.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny J. Jeffries

customer_reviews.title: too big for 6yo
customer_reviews.text: My niece is very happy with it, but it's too big for her, even though her size is 6.
customer_reviews.author: Liza

customer_reviews.title: Great Costume!
customer_reviews.text: It fit just as is says. Fabric is great. My daughter fits a little girls size 5, I got the size that fit a 4-6. I had to tighten the skirt a bit with a few stitches. But that just means she has room to grow and play in it.
customer_reviews.author: Amburr

customer_reviews.title: Cute costume.
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter loves this character. She loves to dress up like her favorite characters. This is a birthday gift. It seems to run larger than I exspected. It was delivered on time. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Marlene

customer_reviews.title: Good for price
customer_reviews.text: The material was slightly thinner than anticipated. My daughter loves it to play dress up in, so the overall goal of purchase was a success.
customer_reviews.author: Maria C.

customer_reviews.title: Decent product for value, obviously not made to last
customer_reviews.text: I should have known better trying to avoid the overpriced official version, but this is great for how inexpensive it is! The material of the skirt is basically paper—so, not durable in any way. Great for light use, but if your kiddo is like mine and wants to sleep in this, it won’t last. Great value for a quick one-time use, but I’m going to end up paying big bucks for a licensed version that can be well-loved.
customer_reviews.author: Katy

customer_reviews.title: simple Moana dress-up
customer_reviews.text: Looks exactly as pictured. A little on the cheap side. Works well for dress-up. A little too big for my 4 year old.......since it IS too big. She can put on herself fairly easily.
customer_reviews.author: Whimsical

customer_reviews.title: Loved it. Was a little big for my 3 ...
customer_reviews.text: Loved it. Was a little big for my 3 1/2 yr old had to throw in a couple stitches in the back and sides but it WAS THE BEST COSTUME I HAVE EVER GOTTNE FOR HER. Would happily recommend this piece to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for my daughter’s b-day party
customer_reviews.text: When my 6year old daughter had her birthday party she wore this and it was a big hit! She loved it! She is a little on the small side so we had to pin the skirt a bit. We also had a bouncy house and she was very active, so good quality too. Overall it was great!
customer_reviews.author: Angela Santillán

customer_reviews.title: Very inexpensive.
customer_reviews.text: I was so happy to find this. No one anywhere had a Moana costume in stock, and we were having a Moana birthday party. The costume isn't as high quality as the Disney Store version, but it was so inexpensive I didn't care at all.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Grinstead

customer_reviews.title: Runs a little big
customer_reviews.text: It runs a little big but it's super cute! My daughter just turned 6 and it is a little big on her. We can pen it around her waist for now and she will be able to grow into it. It would be simply to alter if you need to.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size. Very nice costume.
customer_reviews.text: Just the perfect size for my little one. I think this fits kids 42-50 inches tall nicely. Nice costumer for the Halloween and now they are part of her doll house (closet) decor.
customer_reviews.author: Hoei L

customer_reviews.title: Durable and still cute
customer_reviews.text: We have had this costume for 3 months now and it has survived several machine washings and drying. It still looks as bright as ever. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Marisa (Adams) Compton

customer_reviews.title: This is my daughter’s new favorite princess dress
customer_reviews.text: Oh goodness. This is my daughter’s new favorite princess dress. It’s SO cute!!! I didn’t even mind that she wore it to the store last week (with pants under and a coat of course). We are planning to get the necklace and wig to complete the look.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Diederich

customer_reviews.title: The size 4-6 runs HUGE
customer_reviews.text: This thing is HUGE! I read reviews and thought it might be a little large on my daughter that's a girl's size 6. She's swimming in it! Like.. it won't fit her for another couple of years. So disappointed, it's so cute!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Regalado

customer_reviews.title: Size a little wonky, but my girl loved it!!
customer_reviews.text: Our only problem was that this fits kind of tight in the top, but the skirt was huge! Granted our girl was in a 4/5 at the time and the range is up to a 6x, we just tacked it to fit smaller and she loved it!
customer_reviews.author: Hailey Bullis

customer_reviews.title: Runs large
customer_reviews.text: Runs large. We had to use a safety pin as it was too big. But my daughter loved it
customer_reviews.author: Rachel R.

customer_reviews.title: Great present
customer_reviews.text: 4 year old granddaughter wanted the only Princess outfit she didn’t have! Loved it & I also purchased the necklace too! Just be careful of the straps that hold top up.
customer_reviews.author: MK Quinn

customer_reviews.title: Made well
customer_reviews.text: Got the smallest size for my 4 year old and its a little too big however the costume itself is well made and was delivered on time
customer_reviews.author: Claudette

customer_reviews.title: Just as advertized
customer_reviews.text: Just like in the stores. All went well with delivery. Decently made. Only problem s are with the one size fits all. Thank fully we have an accomplished sewer in the family
customer_reviews.author: M. Stone

customer_reviews.title: Little big
customer_reviews.text: My 7 yr old got this for her birthday. She is smaller than most but it is huge on her and she can't wear it yet. So I would not agree that it is for 4-6x....
customer_reviews.author: PrincessLeia79

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: Good quality for the price. I purchased for my niece who just turned 4. It look like it would fit her a little big though but at least she'll get more use out of it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon mom

customer_reviews.title: Darling!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my 4-year-old granddaughter, who is in love with Moana. It was very cute. We had to take up the skirt a little to fit, but I know she will have lots of fun playing in it.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie Y

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Way better than expected! Very great price and adorable. It was a little big for my almost 3 year old but easy to pin back.
customer_reviews.author: TBK.

product_meta.title: Disney Moana Girls Adventure Outfit , Size 4-6X
product_meta.description:
Moana is an adventurous, tenacious and compassionate 16-year-old who is struggling to find her true self. But when her island is threatened by a mythical darkness, Moana breaks the rules and sets sail on an epic adventure to save her people and find the answers she's been searching for her whole life. Relive the adventure of Moana; This iconic 2-piece outfit features unique prints and the skirt to match. The skirt also has two layers that include fringe details for an authentic Moana Adventure look; Recommended for ages 3+. Fits sizes 4-6X is a child size S.

BRAND STORY
By Moana
feature_bullets: This iconic 2 piece outfit features unique prints and the skirt to match
Skirt has 2 layers that include fringe details for an authentic Moana Adventure look

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
